INTRODUCTION.BRIEF: Generate Angular reactive form with just using JSON data. Your form can be very simple to very complex, with automatic status binding, and it supports other UI libraries!

FEATURES.NESTED_LEVELS: Create FormControl, FormGroup and FormArray, with as many nested level as you wish.
FEATURES.VALIDATORS: Supports Angular built in validators and custom validators.
FEATURES.STATUS_BINDING: Toggle input visibility or validators based on value of other form control.
FEATURES.CSS_GRID: Flexible input field layout using the CSS grid.
FEATURES.CUSTOM_COMPONENTS: Support custom components. Build your own that totally fits you.
